message:
🕉️ Om Satnam Sakshi 🕉️

🛕 **Shri Amrapur Asthan** 🛕

🚩 **Satguru Swami Teoonram Chauth Mahotsav** 🚩

📅 **April 3, 2025 (Thursday)**

🗓️ **On the first Chauth of Hindu New Year 2082, Nav Samvatsar...**

🌅 **Morning Program:**
🔹 **6:00 AM - 7:00 AM:** 🔥 Havan Yajna 
🔹 **7:00 AM - 8:30 AM:** Prayer, Satguru Teoonram Mahima Satsang, Solha Shikshaen, Dhuni

🌇 **Evening Program:**
🔹 **4:00 PM - 4:30 PM:** Satguru Teoonram Chalisa & Janam Sakhi 📖
🔹 **4:30 PM - 6:30 PM:** Brahm Darshani Path Sahib
🔹 **6:30 PM:** Aarti, offering of 56 Bhog Thal, Bhajans of celebration 🎶

📍 **Shri Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur**

🕉️ Om Satnam Sakhi 🕉️

With the blessings of Mangalmoorti Acharya Satguru Swami Teoonram Ji Maharaj
Organized by Amrapur Seva Samiti

**Free Physiotherapy Camp**

🕘 **Every Sunday, Time: 9 AM to 11 AM**

📍 Location: Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur

Conditions Treated: - Joint Pain - Back Pain - Knee Pain - Neck Pain - Elbow Pain - Paralysis - Sciatica Pain - Sports Injury - Frozen Shoulder - Ligament Injury - Children's Disability - Muscle Strain

📞 For more information, contact:
B.D. Tekwani (General Secretary) ☎ 9785362675
Dr. Shweta Belaramani (BPT. IAFT) ☎ 7597070427

🕉️ Om Satnam Sakhi 🕉️

With the blessings of Mangalmoorti Acharya Satguru Swami Teoonram Ji Maharaj
Organized by Amrapur Seva Samiti

**👨‍⚕ Free Neurotherapy Medical Camp & Free ZEN DENN Yoga Sadhana Shivir**

🕘 **Every Sunday | Time: 9:00 AM to 12:00 Noon**

📍 Venue: Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur

Health issues addressed include: skin disorders, digestive issues, respiratory problems, nerve and joint conditions, child-related ailments, knee pain, back pain, and more medical guidance.

📞 For more information, please contact:
B.D. Tekwani (General Secretary) ☎ 9785362675
Mrs. Deep Taneja (Yoga Specialist) ☎ 9413400025
